title: Identifiers
description: Standard identifier patterns used across all OpenDataLayer schemas.

hashedEmail.description: A SHA-256 hex-encoded hash of a lowercase, trimmed email address (64 characters).

anonymousId.description: A non-empty anonymous identifier assigned to an unidentified visitor.

userId.description: A non-empty unique identifier for an authenticated user.

sessionId.description: A non-empty unique identifier for a user session.

deviceId.description: A non-empty unique identifier for a device.

eventId.description: A UUID v4 identifier uniquely identifying a single event.
